resources.string:
Welcome to Maze Velocity!
Objective: - Reach the goal cell as quickly as possible. - Collect points by completing levels and unlocking vehicles.
Controls: - Swipe or use arrow buttons to move your vehicle through the maze. - Avoid dead ends and find the fastest path!
Game Modes: - Classic: No time pressure. Focus on solving the maze. - Chase: Collect as many points as possible before time runs out. - Timed: Race against the clock for a high score.
Unlock Vehicles: - Complete levels or reach high scores to unlock faster vehicles.
Ready? Select your vehicle and start chasing velocity!
